name: Late Bloomer
description:
Late Bloomer is a game where you plant flowers to  use as platforms to make it to the raincloud!

This game was made for the Great Springtime Game Jam: 2021!

Controls:

Arrow keys - Move

Z- Interact

Space - Jump

Esc - Pause

R - Reset level

Contains music ©2020 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io)
